attributes.action: Use Ascension Island as a prison for all british prisoners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A marvellous friend of mine, Daniel Murray made me aware of this island only today.  It is in the middle of the South Atlantic ocean with the nearest land being 800 miles away.  It is British owned and would be perfect as a prison. I urge you Gordon, to consider this marvellous idea.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
